inn1.comm: bit short outside the off stump and Nicol stays beside the line and steers it wide of backward point, good start
this one kept a bit low and skidded through to the keeper, poked his bat out
pokes at another one, half forward and the ball was moving away, good carry to the keeper
this was a jaffa, Malinga brings it closer to the off stump and gets it to move away late, nearly an edge
well what an over! Beaten yet again, Nicol not sure where his off stump is, prods forward to drive and nearly feathers an edge
he does get some bat on it this time and it's a thick outside edge that beats backward point
even Kula beats the outside edge, was well forward and across and he's beaten on the drive
encouraging inward movement and he gets well across and defends
that moved in a great deal, couldn't control the swing and down the leg side and Sanga flung himself to his left and couldn't stop it
this was shorter and it straightened after pitching, the batsman poked his bat out
nearly a run out! Nicol jabbed at it towards short cover and set off, had to hurry and Mendis's underarm flick just missed the stumps, Nicol would have gone
beats the left-hander, moved away sharply from Latham and he left it alone
good length on the off stump and he stays back and defends solidly
this could happen all day, Malinga beats Nicol yet again, this late away movement is testing him
Dropped! Angelo the culprit at first slip, Nicol was forward and got a healthy outside edge and Mathews turned to his left and should have taken it, at a comfortable height and it beats him
gets forward and gets an thick inside edge to the pads
another beauty beats him, this one straightened after pitching and nearly took the edge
gets across and he pushes it to the off side
solidly defended on the front foot, that should make Nicol feel a bit better
shuffles and taps it towards mid-on
low bounce this time, leaves the left-hander and it goes on the first bounce to the keeper
gets good movement away from the left-hander, Latham does not offer a shot
not as much movement this time, Latham is happy to leave those
hr puts bat on ball this time, gets across and taps it to point
lands outside leg, skids and hits his back leg, half-hearted appeal
Nicol decides to give the charge, doesn't quite come off, gets an outside edge to third man
this was full and quick and swinging in, Latham just manages to squeeze it out to the on side
this was shorter and Latham shaped to cut and it got the toe end of the bat and bounced to Mahela at second slip
slower ball and half volley wide outside off and Latham could only drive straight to cover
awkward shot by Latham, he stays at the crease and tries to drive square off the front foot and he's beaten
late inswing and Latham mistimes the flick to the on side
confident shout for an lbw! Swings in late and he was forward and well across, perhaps outside the line of the off stump
pushes it through the line wide of the bowler and a quick single to mid-on
overpitched on middle and he flicks it away wide of square leg and Mendis gives chase
moves away from the left-hander and left alone
down the leg side and it sounded like it hit something but wide called
goes for the slash outside off and it really moved away sharply after pitching, Latham misses
Latham awkwardly tucks it away to the on side, nearly loses his balance in the process
tucks a length delivery down to midwicket
down the track and he mistimes the drive down to mid-on and Thisara fumbles, lets it go between his legs

the break in play has broken Latham's concentration, lands on a good length on the off stump, hint of inward movement in the air, straightens after pitching and Latham left a big gap between bat and pad, ball shaves the off stump
Watling goes well across, covers the line and defends
not as much bounce this time and he gets across and leaves it alone
gets across his stumps and he clips it wide of midwicket
moves across to defend and the ball moves back in and hits his pads outside the line of the off stump
moves away from the right-hander and he leaves it alone
Nicol pokes his bat out and the ball leaves him, well kept
at last a convincing shot by Nicol, this one moved back in and he stayed at the crease and chipped it off the front foot comfortably over midwicket
moves back in and he gets across and defends
moves away from him and he's beaten
moves away and he gets across and softly pushes it to the off side
holds the length back and he leaves it alone to the keeper
moves across to defend and he gets an outside edge towards cover point, movement for the bowler
defends to the on side, Watling is conscious of the movement
fuller delivery and he squeezes it wide of mid-on and sets off quickly
slower ball and he pushes it softly towards mid-off
stays at the crease and punches it down to cover
Watling did well to ride the swing, moved in sharply towards the pads and he gently clipped it wide of square leg, good shot
moved back in sharply after pitching and he gently clipped it to mid-on
bit wide outside off, not much bounce and he stabbed it down to backward point
that variable bounce again, straightens after pitching and goes on the first bounce to Sanga
leaves it alone to the keeper again
good length outside off and pushed to the off side
nicely placed, he chips down the track and punches it just wide of short extra cover and the diving mid-off, ball slows down before the rope
lands outside off and he gets across and leaves it alone
no movement at all before reaching the rope, gets across and leaves it
gets an inside edge that trickles past the stumps
moves away and he goes for the drive and he's beaten, well kept by the keeper
nips back in and he tucks it to the on side and sets off
shapes to cut and he ends up chopping it towards point
fielding hasn't been the sharpest, hoicks him across the line and mistimes it and Malinga doesn't time his dive well at mid-on
wide outside off and he cuts him down to the sweeper on the off side
keeps it on a length outside off and he leaves it alone
moves back in and the batsman was well across and patted it towards mid-on
stays beside the line and pushes it towards the off side
fuller delivery and he comes well forward and drives towards cover
full delivery and drives through the line and Mathews gets a hand to it
gave him the width but he drives and can't pierce the off side field
on a good length outside off and he punches it straight to cover
this was shorter and Watling swivels and pulls along the turf to fine leg
drifts on the pads and he moves across and whips it down to fine leg, it was in the air
bit of extra bounce this time, outside off and Nicol adjusted well and slashed it over backward point and wide of third man
fuller delivery and pushed it down to mid-off
good running, dropped it with soft hands to the off side and set off, the throw was wide
pushes it just side of mid-off and no single this time
Perera errs by giving width, too short too outside off and slashed wide of point and Herath cannot sprint across and cut it off
too wide outside off and driven down to deep cover
moves in late after pitching and he gets across and defends
nicely driven with a straight bat and straight to mid-off
drifts on the pads and he tucks it wide of midwicket
punches it just wide of the fielder at mid-off and there was some hesitation but Thirimanne didn't pick up cleanly
shows the full face and drives straight to mid-off
doesn't get turn and it's the arm ball, cuts close to the body and finds point
full on the pads and driven down to mid-on
comes forward and defends
another arm ball and he tucks it behind square on the on side
arm ball and  it's down the leg side and it clips his pad and beats the keeper
down the leg side and it clips something before reaching the keeper and it's drinks
gets across and punches it wide of point for a single
fuller and he chips it uppishly down to mid-on
gives him a bit of width and he drives him down to cover
good improvisation, he gave himself some room and timed the punch well past point and placed it well, beats the diving fielder
nips back in and he tucks it to the on side
punches it down to mid-on and sets off
cuts close to the body and chops it to the off side
inside edge on the drive and it misses the stumps
cuts back in this time with the arm and it hits him high on the pads, nearly an lbw
gets forward and mistimes the punch to the off side
slower through the air and he tries to paddle it from outside off and fails to make proper contact
flat delivery and wide, reaches out and punches it hard to sweeper cover
comes well forward and whips it down to midwicket
tossed up on the pads and gently worked down to midwicket
drives a full delivery straight to short extra cover
bowls it really flat and the batsman can only chop it to extra cover
quicker and fuller and clipped towards square leg, brings up the 50 stand
full on middle and off and driven down to mid-off
driven back to the bowler, looked like the carrom ball
floated on the pads and clipped towards midwicket
tossed up and floated on middle and leg and clips the pads and looked like missing leg, optimistic shout
defends to the off side
tossed up outside off and he was across to drive and got an inside edge past the stumps
driven back and well stopped by the bowler to his right
pushes  a full delivery through the line down to long-off
gets nicely behind the line and defends
bowls it flat and wide and he slaps it down to sweeper cover
looked like the googly, comes forward and gets an inside edge
defends close to the pads and Sangakkara was very optimistic with the lbw appeal, may have been an edge
comes forward and drives towards long-off
floated on middle and leg and tucked away down to midwicket
pushes a flatter delivery to extra cover
drives towards extra cover
drives back to the bowler and Herath cuts it off to his right
flatter delivery and cuts to sweeper cover
tries to cut but he's beaten
gets forward and across and drives wide of the bowler
the singles are coming, gets on his knee and sweeps to deep square leg
goes back and cuts to sweeper cover
reads the googly just in time, manages to clip it to the on side
tossed up and he gets forward and drives to cover
slower through the air and driven back to the bowler
lunges forward and gets a leading edge towards cover, got a few excited
forced away! Tossed up and Watling was on his knee early and slogged him wide of midwicket, picked the big gap well
comes forward and gets an inside edge to midwicket
tossed up and clipped to the on side
this was too short, he went back at the crease and pulled it firmly down to deep midwicket
driven to extra cover and Dilshan slides and cuts it off
stays back and punches it to the off side
Watling's loving the on side, tossed up and he was on his knee and slogged it in the air over square leg
pushes it to sweeper cover
tossed up and he clips it down to deep square leg
stays back at the crease and thumps it down to deep point
gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
stays back and he stabs at the ball and it nearly carries to the bowler
tossed up down the leg side and swept straight to short fine leg
comes forward and drives straight to short extra cover
now where did that take off from! Really kicked up off a good length outside off and beat Watling who raised his neck in reaction to the bounce
leaves it outside off and the variable bounce tests Sanga who fumbles
thin edge! Perera lands it on roughly the same area of the previous two deliveries, Nicol decided to go for the drive and gets a faint edge to the keeper
full outside off and driven down to mid-off
good length outside off and he cuts it wide of backward point and the sweeper picks up
gets nicely across and quietly defends back to the bowler
tossed up and he gets well forward and defends
he's happy to defend this one too
tossed up and clipped to the on side
can't blame the keeper for that, it was flung wide outside the leg stump, the carrom ball not coming off
gets forward and drives towards mid-on
goes through with the arm and he drives towards cover
drives a full delivery back to the bowler
short of a length and he defends towards mid-on
this one kicks up a bit again, Watling gets another one from Perara, eyes on the ball
lovely drive, half volley outside the off stump and he crashes that wide of the covers and the fielder at sweeper cover couldn't time his dive properly
comes forward and pushes it to the off side
cuts wide of backward point and he sets off quickly, Taylor wants the second run and the throw to Sanga is flat, he breaks the wickets and Taylor's home, third umpire takes a look
tucks a flat delivery down to square leg
works it towards square leg
tossed up and defended on the front foot
slower through the air and defended
drives a full delivery straight to cover
tossed up on the pads and he can't put it away for a single to get to his fifty
goes back and punches a single to sweeper cover
cuts a wide one down to square third man and he brings up his fifty
stabs it down to cover and tells his partner to wait
gives him width again and he cuts it straight  to point

nervy moment for both batsmen! Driven and it was in the air and well short of mid-off, Watling set off for the single, had to scamper back and the throw to the bowler's end was wide, Watling would have gone
clears the fielder! Taylor was down the track and he lofted it well over mid-off's (Tharanga) reach
stays back and works it down to deep midwicket
comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
driven firmly and well stopped by Dilshan at short extra cover
slower through the air and defended
down the track and Taylor whams it back to the bowler
goes right across the stumps and exposes all three in an attempt to sweep, can't beat short fine leg
tossed up down the leg side and wide called
tossed up and slower and driven down to long-off
fuller on the pads and squeezed out to mid-on
very flat this time and he punches it to mid-off
tossed up slower and defended to the on side
goes back and pulls him down to deep midwicket
drives a full delivery to sweeper cover
gets forward and drives him down to mid-off
flatter delivery and he drives him to long-off

Jayawardene takes a sharp catch! Tossed up on middle and off and Watling was down on his knee to slog, mistimed it and instead it went flat and Jayawardene was alert at short midwicket, timed his dive well and took it
softly pushes his first ball back to the bowler
tucks this one to midwicket
slower through the air and clipped softly to midwicket
that's a poor ball, full toss down the leg side and the fine leg is up, easily worked away round the corner to fine leg
gets forward and tucks it to the on side for a single
the wrong un, defended safely
tossed up on leg and softly worked to the on side
slashed hard and brilliant stop by Mahela at cover point, setting a good example
flatter and he plays it with the turn to cover
straight on middle and off and he gets behind the line and defends
drifts on the pads quite late and he clips him down to deep square leg
hint of late away swing and Franklin remains watchful, can only softly push it to cover
slower ball on the pads and he softly clips it to midwicket and they contemplate a second run but wisely opt out
he bangs this one short and Taylor wasn't really ready for it, he dropped his gloves and didn't offer a shot
hits the deck hard again and Taylor can only manage an outside edge off the glove towards point, end of a good over
Taylor shapes to drive through the off side and swishes and fails to make contact
nearly a run out! Taylor pushes it in front of mid-off and risked the single, Mendis' under-arm flick missed the stumps and he collided with Taylor, has Taylor stretched his hamstring?
moves across his stumps and tucks him away down to midwicket, they need boundaries
uses his feet and tries to force it away across the line and Tharanga does really well to dive to his left and save a boundary at mid-on
uses his feet before the bowler delivers and can only squeeze it to mid-on
that's the shot he was aiming for, looked like the slower ball, lands on the half volley and Taylor shuffles across and chips it over midwicket and the sweeper gave up
Franklin gets a good yorker outside off which he jams out to point
wide down the leg side Franklin tries to pull, Sanga fumbles
fends off a short delivery in front of point and sets off, good bowling
nothing much you can you with that yorker, swinging in on middle stump and dug out to midwicket
tries to pull a bounce but the ball hits him flush on the side of the helmet and rolls to third man, nothing to worry Taylor's doing fine
clips a short of a length delivery to the on side
goes back at the crease and defends to the leg side
Kula lands the yorker on the spot, outside off and squirted out to the off side
Taylor finds the gap, another attempted yorker outside off and Taylor squeezed it out well and found the big gap at deep point, didn't hit it too hard
Kula bowls this one much shorter and Taylor mistimes the tennis forehand to mid-off
another short one and Taylor swings at thin air, he hasn't looked too comfortable against the short one
another splendid yorker, on middle and leg and squirted towards mid-off
can't blame the bowler for that, Franklin moves across his stumps to paddle it away and the yorker clips the pads and beats the keeper and runs to third man
jams out a full delivery to Dilshan at cover point, he takes aim at the bowler's end but Franklin was home
drags the length back and he swivels and pulls to deep square leg
short of a length on the body and he shuffles and clips it just wide of Herath at short fine leg
tries to dig out a yorker outside off and there was a sound before Sangtakkara took the catch, he threw the ball up but the bowler and umpire were not interested, bat hitting the ground
jams out a full delivery wide of cover
and it's only a couple, tucks a short one on the body towards fine leg and they take two easily
slower ball to begin with and he softly pushes it to the off side
on the pads and worked away down to midwicket
keeps it tight again and he can only tap it to the on side
opens the face of the bat and gently dabs it to the off side but cannot beat short third man
moves across the stumps and he tucks it around the corner and Kula dives at short fine leg and fumbles
drilled back to the bowler and Mathews dives to stop it and the ball deflects to the off side off the umpire's shoe
it's the trademark Taylor hoick, it was a length ball, he walked across the stumps and dragged it from the off side and bisected the gap between two fielders at the deep on the on side
goes deep in the crease and tries to hoick again but mistimes it to the off side
opens the face of the bat and he cannot steer it past point
tucks it to the on side and it brings up a fifty stand, strange innings from Franklin who was sent out to pinch-hit
slower ball  and he pushes it to the off side
Franklin comes down the track and he gently dabs it down to cover
comes round the wicket and he gently dabs it towards point and sets off, direct hit by Kula at the batsman's end and they pinch a second run off the ricochet
slides it wide down the leg side
Franklin is happy to just knock the singles around, to the off side this time
full outside off and Taylor moves across his stumps and whips it to long-on and he brings up his fifty
slower ball and once again tapped away with soft hands to point for a single
all power! Half volley outside off and he has the width to get across and wham it over extra cover, finds the big gap
low full toss on the off stump and worked away to deep midwicket
full outside off and he works it down to long-on
Franklin finally shows signs of aggression, he tries to loft straight and misses the ball completely
down the track and drives firmly down the ground and Perera does well to dive at long-on
low full toss outside off and he squeezes it out to point
Taylor's favourite shot! The slower ball from the back of the hand, Taylor picked it early, got on his knee and hoicked him over deep midwicket
good comeback lands the yorker on the spot and he manages to dig it out
lucky escape for Perera, bowls it on the body with the fine leg up and Franklin can only pinch a single to Malinga in that position
slower ball and he pulls in front of square, drops short of long-on, Taylor is down on his knee, is he cramping up?
pulls but mistimes it down to deep midwicket, only a single
it hasn't affected his big-hitting! Slower ball and Taylor was waiting for it, fetches it from outside off and biffs it over wide long-on
Dropped: Tharanga had it covered, Taylor biffed it flat and low to mid-off's left, Tharanga moved well, hung on to it and let it go on the fall
the cleanest strike today! Half volley on middle and leg and Franklin made room and lofted it crisply straight down to the sightscreen
low full toss and he miscues the loft down to long-off, clear of the fielders

sharp catch at cover! Kulasekara fired that full outside off and Taylor tried to smoke that past cover, went flat to Mathews who timed his dive well, Mathews showed no emotion after taking it but SL will be relieved they've seen the back of Taylor
punches it towards mid-on and decides against the single
moves across and taps it towards point and cannot pinch the single
bangs it in short and he ducks under the bouncer
full outside off and he cannot pinch the gaps, somehow completes the single as the throw was wide
tries to pinch a single towards point and Dilshan's throw was wide
full on the pads and squirted away down to square leg
low full toss wide outside the off stump and Franklin drives off the bottom half of the bat, mistimed it
Malinga bangs it in short and McCullum can only duck under that one, another dot
attempted yorker becomes a full toss and McCullum backs away and chips it wide of long-on
good improvisation! Short third man was up, Malinga bowled it short and McCullum backed away, played with the bounce and simply carved it over short third man
makes room and squirts out a yorker towards point
McCullum is maintaining the momentum indeed, half volley outside off and he makes room and drives firmly wide of extra cover
short down the leg side and he backs away and pulls to deep midwicket, this is the highest total for NZ v SL in SL
backs away and the ball clips the edge and rolls to the off side
low full toss and he places it to midwicket
McCullum makes room to hoick and he gets an inside edge to fine leg
fires that yorker outside leg, McCullum makes room and adjusts his shot, jams it out to the off side
comes down the track and drills a low full toss down to long-off
goes for the reverse sweep! Goes so far across his stumps, the ball hits the base of the pad outside the line of the stumps, Mathews appeals for the lbw
that was in the air for a long time but Perera kept his eyes on it! Slower ball and McCullum went for the big hit and lofted it over the on side, it swirled and Perera hung on and fell backwards
length ball on the pads and he worked it down to deep square leg
clips it down to midwicket
moved across his stumps to chase a wide one, full outside off and he couldn't make contact
full outside off and he pushes it down to long-off
Ellis stands outside leg and tries to wham that over the on side, well disguised slower ball and the ball just sneaks past the off stump, swing and a miss
slower ball and he times the chip really well and the ball clears midwicket, the sweeper cuts it off
slower ball and he drags this down to deep square leg
yorker to finish things off! Too good for Ellis, he was standing outside leg, Malinga took aim at the leg stump and the batsman couldn't get his bat down on time

inn2.comm: lands it just on the off stump and Tharanga moves across and defends
swish and a miss, it was outside off and didn't move his feet too much
half volley outside off and he didn't try to hit it too hard, just wide of mid-off and well fielded
bowls from slightly wide of the crease, nips back in and he defends
bit of variable bounce this time, kept a touch low outside off and Dilshan slashed and missed
fuller delivery honing in on the leg stump and worked away to midwicket
appeal for an lbw straightaway! Boult swings it in , lands just outside leg and hits his pads outside the line of the leg stump as he tries to flick
swings it on middle and off and Dilshan pushes it to the off side
nips back in and Dilshan gets an inside edge on the drive, rolls to fine leg
lands it outside off and gets some gentle away movement, he leaves it alone
Tharanga was trapped at the crease and managed to defend it despite the low bounce
lands it outside the off stump and he safely leaves it alone
that's a gift on the pads, down the leg side and too wide, Dilshan gets a gentle touch and it races to fine leg
full and wide outside the off stump and Mills can be thankful to McCullum for saving a boundary at cover, good dive
good length outside off and punched to the off side
stays back and punches it firmly down towards mid-off
clips it behind square on the on side for a single
stays back and punches a length ball wide of the diving extra cover fielder, ball slows down before the rope
streaky! How did that miss the off stump? Dilshan goes for the booming cover drive and gets a thick inside edge that sneaks past the off stump
nips back in and he awkwardly tucks it back to the bowler
slashes hard outside the off stump and the ball moves away, he misses it
slants it across but it's too wide outside off
well left by Dilshan, this time Boult had good carry
good length on middle and leg and he fails to tuck it away, hits his pad and dribbles away
almost a run out? Tapped to the off side and Tharanga sets off and has to scamper back, the throw to the bowler's end was wide
sharp bouncer! Tharanga bends and weaves away from it, we didn't see the SL bowlers exploit the bouncer rule too much
defends it back to the bowler
good aggression from Tharanga, this was short and he picked the length early, picks it from outside off and he clubs it over mid-on

soft dismissal! The previous ball was pulled for four and Tharanga tried to repeat that, it was short and he swished too early and got a bottom edge to the keeper, Mills was millimeters away from overstepping
what a sound start for Sanga! Good length outside the off stump and Sanga made use of the width and caressed it past backward point off the back foot
that really darted away after pitching, landed outside off and the ball moved so sharply that Watling collected in front of first slip
yorker on the off stump and he squirts it out to the off side
full and swinging away and he softly pushed it towards cover
tests with a full one swinging away late, Sanga gets his bat down and gets an outside edge to point
hits the deck hard and Sangakkara is quick to get on his knees and avoid the bouncer
rare bad delivery as he strays wide down the leg side
lands it a touch wide outside the off stump and he safely leaves it alone
classy cover drive! The extra ball costs New Zealand a boundary, half volley moving away and he gets on his knee and sends it scurrying past cover
punches a length delivery outside off straight towards extra cover
nips back in and he gets an inside edge to the leg side and they call for the run, Sanga dived but the fielder wasn't quick enough
lands outside leg and he shuffles and clips it to the on side
drifts on the pads and he clips it away off the pads down to fine leg
pushes a length ball outside off towards mid-off and they set off
on the pads and he fliks him down to deep midwicket
on target straightaway and he stays back and defends
gives him width outside off and he easily places it down to third man

the break brings a wicket! Excellent catch by Nicol! It was wide outside the off stump and Sangakkara tried to slice it wide of backward point, it was an uppish slice and Nicol kept his eyes on the ball dived full length to his right and caught it
fires that down the leg side and wide called
this was a touch wide outside the off stump and he leaves it alone
a few New Zealanders got a bit excited, swinging on the pads and chipped away over midwicket, it was a bit flat and a few fielders though it was a catching chance, safe shot
stays beside the line and pushes it to the off side
drifts on the pads and he tucks it around the corner off his pads
this was down the leg side, landed on middle and leg and moved away

that was a super delivery! Nipped back a little and the ball managed to beat the inside edge and clip the top of the pad on the way to the keeper, looked like he was out bowled at first, it was also hitting him high
stays back and pushes it to the off side
shuffles and tucks it with the angle to the on side
bowls from slightly wide of the crease and landed it full and got it to move late, Dilshan was fishing at it
strays on the pads and Dilshan fails to put it away
stays beside the line and steers it to the off side
wide outside the off stump and he thumped it but couldn't beat point
squared him up and he managed an outside edge wide of backward point, so close!
thrashed away but straight to Nicol at backward point, bowler lucky to get away
good cricket, drops it with soft hands in front of mid-off and calls early
extra bounce outside off and he slashes and misses, we saw a few taking off in the first innings
bangs it in short and he swivels and pulls hard to Boult at fine leg, Dilshan's now the 3rd batsman to score 1000 plus runs in ODIs in 2012, after Sanga and Kohli
stays beside the line and steers him down to point
half volley on the pads and he flicks it straight to fine leg
that's the length! Pitched up and moving away and tempting the drive, Mahela could so easily have feathered an edge
and occasionally Southee strays on the pads, easily worked away to fine leg
on the pads and he digs it out to square leg, runs the first hard and puts pressure on the fielders for the second
shot! Boult sprays that wide outside off and Jayawardene moves his back foot across and carves it past the big gap between backward point and cover
brings it in a little and he safely leaves it alone
moves across and gently clips it to the on side
shuffles a bit too far across and gets an inside edge to his pads to the on side
shuffles across to cover the line and defend to the on side
gets across and punches it wide of mid-off and takes a quick single, good running
close call! Southee gets one to kick up off a length and move away slightly as the ball passes the bat, Mahela even looked back
and that's followed by a wide down the leg side, Southee needs to be more consistent with his line
fuller in length and pushed through the line down to mid-on
sign of class! Southee bowls it full and tries to attack the stumps, uses his wrists to good effect and eases it between mid-on and midwicket
gets across and pushes it down to mid-off
short and a touch wide and chopped wide of backward point and there's a slight fumble by Nicol, throw to the batsman's end was wide
length delivery on the stumps and defended solidly
short and wide and slapped straight to backward point
shuffles and clips it with the angle down to square leg
that's more like it, Franklin bowled it fuller and got it to move away late, Dilshan was on the walk for the drive and he missed it
gets across and pushes it to the off side
poor ball, it was overpitched and wide and angling away and Dilshan went across and scooped it over the packed field at cover
he gave him with again but he thrashed it to extra cover
on the pads and pushed down to mid-on
nips back in off a good length and he manages to fend it to the on side
gets beside the line and punches it towards cover
cuts back in a bit more and clips his pads and rolls towards slip
pushes it with soft hands towards mid-off and he has to hurry the single
on the pads and tucked away to the on side
keeps it on middle and leg and he clips it away towards midwicket
good length outside off and he chops it down to mid-off
full outside off and driven down to sweeper cover
full and wide and driven crisply and the fielder sprinting at sweeper cover has a lot of work, does a splendid job by diving and cutting it off
short and wide outside the off stump and he stays beside the line and he slaps it wide of backward point
slower ball and he drops it with soft hands to cover and sets off
full and pushed towards mid-off
bangs it in short and he reads the length early, goes back and pulls in front of square, the fielder can't cut it off at deep midwicket, brings up the 50 stand
another short one and he swivels and pulls him to deep square leg
fullish delivery and he stays behind the line to defend
good running again, dropped with soft hands towards the off side and they call and set off immediately
shuffles at the crease and tucks it softly to the on side and sets off
slower ball and he awkwardly pushes it down the track
comes forward and pushes it with soft hands towards mid-off
comes round the wicket and bowls it full and wide, he reaches out and drives with intent, beats the covers and the sweeper on the boundary
pushes it towards mid-off, dangerous partnership here
round the wicket, Jayawardene gets forward and chips it in the air wide of square leg
Dilshan falls immediately to the spinner! Tossed up on the leg stump, Dilshan moves forward and tries to flick him on the up but ends up tamely chipping it to Williamson at midwicket
flatter ball and softly tucked to the on side
fuller delivery and clipped to the on side
similar delivery, softly tucked to midwicket
fuller ball on the pads and pushed through the line to long-on
starts with a horror ball down the leg side, several feet down the leg side
length ball from round the wicket, pitching on middle and Jayawardene works it in front of square leg
pitched up, on middle again, pushed back towards the bowler
on the pads this time, nurdled in front of square leg for a single
looks to sweep a ball heading down, misses and he is struck on the pad, Mathews wants one, Jayawardene yells 'No'
goes for the sweep once more, once again he misses, that is off the pad and past the keeper for leg-byes
fuller and on off stump, wristed behind square leg
almost a yorker, squeezed out to midwicket
length ball outside off stump, that is thumped off the front foot past cover for four
worked to the leg side this time by Mahela, who is looking untroubled here
Mathews in a bit of bother there, he was looking for the turn in, but the ball skids on, past the outside edge as Mathews looks to caress the ball through the off side
skips down the track to muscle the ball down to long-on, took it on the full that time Mathews
a shout of 'Catch it', but the ball lands well short of anyone after Jayawardene turns the ball towards midwicket
Nicol from over the wicket, fired in towards off stump, defended to the leg side
length ball is nudged towards square leg for a single
nice turn in towards the off stump, taps it behind square leg
length ball just outside off, driven towards midwicket, can't place it well enough for a single
on middle and leg, glanced towards short fine leg, again finds the fielder
looks to power the ball down the ground, sends it towards long-on for a jogged single
tossed up, on a length and just outside off, driven towards long-on for one more
another length ball on off, no flight this time, clipped past a diving midwicket, Sri Lanka not taking many risks here
third single of the over, eased towards long-on once more, DL par score is 104 at this stage
waits for it and tucks it to midwicket
defended back to the bowler
